name: Crank Bandicook
description:
Crank Bandicook is the next generation of 3d platformer games.

Get through the obstacle course and collect the crystal to complete the one room level.

Made for Games Factory Jam.

Themes of this jam:

  • One Room
  • Death
  • Laser

Textures, Models, and music was all royalty free.

(Clearly inspired by Crash Bandicoot)
